ch.neliuk.tools.timeevo.observers

Interface Observable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Clock

    public interface Observable
    Implements an observable which can update its observers

    Add the ability to handle many objects that implements "Observer"

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sardaukar
    See Also:
    Observer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(Observer obs)
      Add an observer to the list of observers.
      void delObservers()
      Empty the whole list of observers
      void updateObservers()
      Inform of an update every observer that subscribed to this observable

        Inform of an update every observer that subscribed to this observable
